description.value: A brief description of what CBDS IG is about
This profile describes an Allergy or Intolerance using an ATC code for afflictions caused by drugs or a snomed code for other causes.
This profile describes an Attachment for a DocumentManifest.
This profile describes an AuditEvent manually performed by a Practitioner
This profile describes an observation used to document one or more pairs of code and values in its components.
This profile describes a Bundle profile that enforces signatures for documents
This profile describes a Condition that has the attributes marked as mandatory that are used in resource queries.
This profile describes the agreement of a Patient to an attached structured Consent document.
This profile describes the approval of a Patient's agreement to an attached structured Consent document in form of a Signature.
This extension allows to add a reference to a ConsentApproval-IEHR and thus a signature of the patient to a Cosnent-IEHR.
This profile describes a signature for a consent.
This profile describes a Composition with a confidentiality code for each section and a signature.
This profile constrains the IPS to fix the multiple possible target error.
This profile constrains a Condition describing the Conclusion of a Diagnosis.
This profile describes the basic DiagnosticReport, from which the various types of reports in the CBDE context are derived.
This profile describes a DiagnosticReport to document radiology findings in the context of the CBDE.
This profiles describes a DiagnosticReport to document findings of Instrumental Examination.
This profile describes a DiagnosticReport to document laboratory findings in the context of the CBDE.
This profile describes a DiagnosticReport containing multiple Vital Sign observations.
This profile describes a general DocumentReference.
This profile describes a DocumentManifest.
This profile describes a Encounter profile that allows signatures.
This profile describes an hospital discharge report.
This profile describes the documentation of an Immunization.
This profile describes a Media profile that allows signatures.
This profile describes the result of a medical visit.
This profile describes a Medication using ATC codes
This profile describes a MedicationStatement using MedicationIEHR as medicationReference.
This profile describes prescriprions for different kinds of medication.
This profile constraints the Observation.code attribute to LOINC codes.
This profile describes a Patient with a birthplace extension.
This profile describes a time period defined by a mandatory start and an optional end date/time.
This profile describes a Provenance with mandatory Author and Provider information and signature.
This extension allows to add a Provenance-IEHR to any DomainResource.
This profile describes an Extension that displays the confidentiality for a section.
This profile describes a signature for a resource.
This profile describes an extended Translation.
This profile describes a CarePlan regarding the planned treatment of a patient.
This profile describes an Extension to add unstructured results to a DiagnosticReport.
